  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_463</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_463</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Áreas de cuerpos geométricos</string>
            <string language="en">The areas of geometric shapes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Bereiche der geometrischen Formen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les zones des formes géométriques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As áreas de formas geométricas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le zone delle figure geometriche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι τομείς των γεωμετρικών μορφών</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones las diferentes fórmulas y formas de calcular áreas de cuerpos geométricos. Se estudian las formas de calcular áreas laterales y totales de cilindros, conos, poliedros y esfera.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to deduce different formulae and ways to calculate the areas of geometric shapes. It studies ways to calculate the side areas and the total areas of cylinders, cones, polyhedra and spheres.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cuerpo geométrico</string>
            <string language="en">geometric shape</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cono</string>
            <string language="en">cone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">área</string>
            <string language="en">area</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">área lateral</string>
            <string language="en">side area</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">esfera</string>
            <string language="en">sphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, unterschiedliche Formeln und Methoden abzuleiten, die 
Bereiche der geometrischen Formen zu errechnen. Sie studiert 
Methoden, die seitlichen Bereiche und die ganzen Gebiete der Zylinder,
der Kegel, der Polyeder und der Bereiche zu errechnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de déduire différentes formules et voies de calculer les
zones des formes géométriques. Elle étudie des voies de 
calculer les zones latérales et les surfaces totales des cylindres, 
des cônes, des polyèdres et des sphères.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações deduzir 
fórmulas e maneiras diferentes calcular as áreas de formas 
geométricas. Estuda maneiras calcular as áreas laterais e as 
áreas totais de cilindros, de cones, de polyhedra e de esferas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni dedurre
le formule ed i modi differenti calcolare le zone delle figure 
geometriche. Studia i modi calcolare le zone laterali e le aree 
totali dei cilindri, dei coni, dei poliedri e delle sfere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να συναγάγει τους διαφορετικούς τύπους και τους τρόπους να 
υπολογιστούν οι τομείς των γεωμετρικών μορφών. Μελετά τους 
τρόπους να υπολογιστούν οι δευτερεύουσες περιοχές και οι 
συνολικές περιοχές των κυλίνδρων, των κώνων, polyhedra και των 
σφαιρών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geometrische Form</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">seitlicher Bereich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">forme géométrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cône</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">zone latérale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la géométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">forma geométrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">área</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωμετρία</string>
          </keyword>
